EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-Email-nurture Utilities-T0021Q.Stream 1_Email 3_Why MPLS
EmailTemplate.subject: Can your network meet the demands of the smart grid?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Build the best foundation for your smart grid Why IP/MPLS makes sense Technology is promising a better future for power utilities. The options available for grid modernization will help you increase operational efficiency <[[https://insight.nokia.com/why-ipmpls-network-makes-sense-smart-grids?did=d000000000dz&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=why-an-mpls-wp&utm_term=marketo]]> and contain costs while enhancing quality and reliability. Now you can enable the grid with the required secure, reliable and adaptive communications, support existing mission-critical TDM services, and prepare the way for these innovative new smart grid applications. Start smart… © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
